name: Sylvie's Apple Pancakes
description: Caramelized apples make these pancakes extra special.
preparation: Melt butter in frying pan over medium heat. Add the apples and sprinkle with Maple Spice Dip Mix. Caramelize the apples until deep golden in colour. Set aside to cool.
Whisk flour, sugar, baking powder, Apple Pie Spice, and salt in a mixing bowl. Set aside.
Whisk eggs, vanilla extract, and milk until frothy. Add the flour mixture until just combined.
Stir in melted butter and cooked apples.
Preheat frying pan to medium heat. Drop in 1⁄4 cup batter for each pancake. Flip pancakes when bubbles begin to appear on surface and edges are crisp. Cook to golden brown.
tips: For a lighter, fluffier pancake, separate the eggs and whisk the whites separately until soft peaks form. Fold into the finished batter.

products.name: Apple Pie Spice
summary: Move over pumpkin spice; it's time for Apple Pie Spice to shine! Perfect for leveling up the taste of fall-inspired baking, it's also great on top of oatmeal, in a frothy late or smoothie â€“ or anywhere you want a punch of apple pie flavour.
